PendingInterrupt Class Reference

Detailed Description

Defines an interrupt that is scheduled to occur in the future.

The internal data structures are left public to make it simpler to manipulate.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PendingInterrupt::PendingInterrupt (  VoidFunctionPtr  func,
int  param,
Time  t,
IntType  kind
) 
 

Initialize a hardware device interrupt that is to be scheduled to occur in the near future.

Parameters:
func is the procedure to call when the interrupt occurs
param is the argument to pass to the procedure
time is when (in simulated time) the interrupt is to occur
kind is the hardware device that generated the interrupt

Member Data Documentation

The argument to the function.

VoidFunctionPtr PendingInterrupt::handler
 

The function (in the hardware device emulator) to call when the interrupt occurs

for debugging

Time PendingInterrupt::when
 

When the interrupt is supposed to fire.
